jd.notes_for_resume:
- Emphasize 8+ years of experience in data science and machine learning, specifically in a product-driven environment.
- Highlight proficiency in Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn, SQL, Sagemaker, and Snowflake.
- Detail your experience deploying ML models into production, including MLOps best practices and cloud platform usage (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
- Showcase deep subject matter expertise in NLP and working with healthcare data (both structured and text).
- Provide specific examples of leading cross-team initiatives and driving measurable business impact with ML models.
- Mention any mentorship or technical guidance provided to other data scientists.

profile.headline: STAFF DATA SCIENTIST | CLINICAL AI (NLP/LLMs) | REVENUE INTEGRITY & MLOPS (AWS)

experience_years_claims.evidence: Staff-level Data Scientist / ML Engineer with 8+ years building and deploying production ML in healthcare
and 15+ years across healthcare IT/software engineering.

experience.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer & AI Solutions Architect (Staff-level IC scope)
bullets: Led end-to-end ML development and deployment for improper payment prevention and recovery, including pre-pay claim flagging for suspected FWA and post-pay prioritization for SIU/audit workflows; contributed to $15M+ saved/recovered value.

Built LLM/RAG-based summarization to generate concise, human-readable narratives and documentation evidence packets supporting claim review and recovery workflows aligned to denial/appeal operations; reduced reviewer investigation time by 30%.

Improved model quality via rapid experimentation, cohort-based error slicing, and threshold tuning; increased precision by 13% through refined feature engineering, decision logic, and workflow routing criteria based on real-world feedback.

Trained and evaluated models using scikit-learn/PyTorch (classification + unsupervised techniques) with disciplined validation, calibration, and production-grade error analysis; iterated with stakeholders to balance precision/coverage and reviewer capacity.

Engineered features from healthcare billing/coding signals including ICD-10, CPT/HCPCS, DRG, revenue codes, modifiers, condition/value/span codes, NDC, provider specialty, peer comparisons, and temporal utilization patterns.

Built scalable, governed pipelines on AWS (SageMaker, Glue/PySpark, S3, Redshift, Lambda, Step Functions) for automated feature extraction, scheduled scoring, and real-time decisioning integrations; implemented monitoring for drift/bias/performance with alerts and SLOs.

Developed and maintained analytics/feature datasets in Snowflake (SQL + data modeling) to accelerate experimentation, standardize training/serving inputs, and support reproducible evaluation across modeling initiatives.
Contributed shared modeling infrastructure (reusable utilities, standardized evaluation harnesses, and deployment/monitoring patterns) to increase iteration speed and consistency across teams.
Mentored data scientists, analysts, and engineers on experimentation best practices, production ML, NLP/LLM workflows, and Python/SQL engineering standards.

experience.title: Senior Associate Consultant (Software Engineer, Healthcare Systems)
bullets: Developed and enhanced healthcare encounter/claims processing systems using Java and SQL/PL/SQL; improved throughput, data quality, and maintainability for high-volume pipelines.
Partnered with architects and business stakeholders to translate regulatory and policy requirements into technical designs and production releases; supported performance tuning and defect reduction.

experience.title: Programmer Analyst (Software Engineer)
bullets: Built backend services and integration components; implemented validation, transformations, and reliability improvements for enterprise workflows.
Created internal automation tools and diagnostics to reduce operational toil and improve incident response.

experience.title: Programmer (Software Engineer)
bullets: Contributed to healthcare system modules and data pipelines; optimized SQL and supported testing/UAT defect fixes to improve stability and delivery quality.

education: Nizam College â€” B.Sc., Mathematics, Physics, Electronics | Hyderabad, India

certifications.name: Data Science and Machine Learning: Making Data-Driven Decisions

bullets.text: Led end-to-end ML development and deployment for improper payment prevention and recovery, including pre-pay claim flagging for suspected FWA and post-pay prioritization for audit workflows; contributed to $15M+ in saved/recovered value.

tailored.resume_text:
NARENDER SURABHI
Staff Data Scientist | Healthcare AI & MLOps
Okemos, MI, USA 48864 | +1 (213) 254-8205 | surabhinarenderrao@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/narendersurabhi | github.com/narendersurabhi

## SUMMARY
Staff-level Data Scientist with 8+ years of experience building and deploying production machine learning models in the healthcare sector, and 15+ years in overall healthcare IT. Specializes in NLP, LLMs, and MLOps on AWS to drive revenue integrity and operational efficiency. Proven leader in developing end-to-end AI solutions, from feature engineering with complex clinical and billing data to production deployment and mentorship.

## SKILLS
- ML / AI & NLP: Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Statistical Modeling, NLP, LLMs & RAG, Model Interpretability & XAI
- Data Platforms & MLOps: AWS, SageMaker, Snowflake, SQL, MLOps & Model Deployment, Spark/PySpark, Docker, CI/CD for ML
- Healthcare Domain: Healthcare Data (Claims, Clinical Text), Revenue Cycle Management, ICD-10, CPT/HCPCS, DRG, HIPAA/PHI

## EXPERIENCE
Senior Machine Learning Engineer & AI Solutions Architect (Staff-level IC scope)
ACENTRA HEALTH | Okemos, MI | Dec 2016 - Present
- Led end-to-end ML development and deployment for improper payment prevention and recovery, including pre-pay claim flagging for suspected FWA and post-pay prioritization for audit workflows; contributed to $15M+ in saved/recovered value.
- Built an LLM/RAG-based summarization system to generate concise, human-readable narratives from medical records, reducing reviewer investigation time by 30% for claim review and denial/appeal operations.
- Engineered features from complex healthcare billing and coding data including ICD-10, CPT/HCPCS, DRG, revenue codes, modifiers, NDC, provider specialty, and temporal utilization patterns to improve model performance.
- Trained and evaluated classification and unsupervised models using scikit-learn and PyTorch, improving precision by 13% through disciplined validation, calibration, cohort-based error analysis, and threshold tuning.
- Built and deployed scalable, governed MLOps pipelines on AWS (SageMaker, Glue/PySpark, S3, Lambda, Step Functions) for automated feature extraction, scheduled scoring, and real-time model deployment.
- Implemented robust monitoring for data drift, model bias, and performance degradation with alerts and SLOs to ensure production model reliability and governance.
- Developed and maintained analytics and feature datasets in Snowflake using SQL and data modeling best practices to accelerate experimentation and ensure reproducible training and evaluation.
- Mentored data scientists and engineers on experimentation best practices, production ML, NLP/LLM workflows, and Python/SQL engineering standards, contributing to shared modeling infrastructure and team-wide velocity.

Senior Associate Consultant (Software Engineer, Healthcare Systems)
INFOSYS | Los Angeles, CA & Pune, India | Sep 2013 - Dec 2015
- Developed and enhanced high-volume healthcare claims processing systems using Java and SQL/PL/SQL, partnering with stakeholders to translate regulatory requirements into production releases.

Programmer (Software Engineer)
COGNIZANT | Hyderabad, India | Sep 2007 - Aug 2010
- Contributed to healthcare system modules and data pipelines; optimized SQL and supported testing/UAT defect fixes to improve stability and delivery quality.

## EDUCATION
Nizam College | Hyderabad, India
B.Sc., Mathematics, Physics, Electronics

## CERTIFICATIONS
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner (AIF-C01), Amazon Web Services, 2025
- Data Science and Machine Learning: Making Data-Driven Decisions, MIT, 2022

suggestions: To more directly address the JD's request for 'leading cross-team initiatives', consider adding a phrase like 'partnered with product, engineering, and clinical review teams' to the Acentra Health experience.
The summary is strong, but could explicitly use the phrase 'product-driven environment' to directly mirror the language in the job description notes.

cover_letter.body:
With over eight years of experience building and deploying production machine learning models within the healthcare revenue cycle domain, I was immediately drawn to the opportunity to contribute to SmarterDx's mission. My background in developing end-to-end AI solutions that drive tangible financial and operational impact in healthcare aligns directly with the responsibilities of a Staff Data Scientist on your team.

My experience at Acentra Health has provided me with deep, hands-on expertise in the required technical stack. I have architected and deployed scalable MLOps pipelines on AWS using Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn, SageMaker, and Snowflake. I specialize in applying advanced NLP techniques to complex healthcare data, engineering features from billing and coding standards like ICD-10, CPT, and DRG to build highly performant and interpretable models.

My work has consistently translated into measurable business value. Key achievements include:
- Leading the development of ML models for improper payment prevention that contributed to over $15M in saved and recovered value.
- Building an LLM/RAG-based summarization system that reduced reviewer investigation time by 30%.
- Improving model precision by 13% through rigorous experimentation, feature engineering, and collaboration with clinical stakeholders.

I am confident that my technical leadership, domain expertise in revenue cycle management, and proven ability to deliver robust ML solutions make me an excellent candidate for this role. I am eager to discuss how my skills can help advance SmarterDx's innovative work and look forward to hearing from you soon.
